name: Zero-based World-从零开始
description:
Zero-based World is a 3D Low-Poly sandbox game.

A Philosophical Story


Dream is essential for everyday life, so is imagination.

One day, when you fall into a sound sleep, this world will form in silence.
Your imagination is the foundation of the dream world where you can create everything.
The stronger you are, the clearer the world will be.


Every time when you awaken from a dream, do you always have the feeling that you might have forgotten something?

All frustrations come from your imagination.
Every time when you wake up, what will your choice be? To forget all about the past, or to find back your memory and confront your inner world?

Infinite Open World


A great fancy land is waiting for you to imagine.

A Living Nature


Traveling through immersive nature environments, from daylight to moonlight, from drizzle to thunderstorm, the weather and nature cycling will bring you a vivid and unique feeling that will stay in your mind for a long time.

Cooperation


Team up with your friends, to make adventures and to fight!

Taming & Riding


Tame various creatures and turn them into your loyal partners.

Homeland


Build up your own homeland and realize your dream.

Deeper Dreamland


Explore the mysterious underground world and hunt for the rarest and most valuable treasure.
